img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 85.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Wukong_Thunderclap_85.jpg)
Once you've taken out his entire health bar, he'll disappear again, sometimes summoning a lightning storm to track you as you try and race back over to him. Take it slow and focus on evasion rather than trying to close the distance.
img_below_text:
This battle may be won, but the war is far from over. Yellowbrow will freeze you in place, and use his magic seed sack to draw you into a perilous prison.
![Wukong Thunderclap 87.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ed/Wukong_Thunderclap_87.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 85.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Wukong_Thunderclap_85.jpg)
Once you've taken out his entire health bar, he'll disappear again, sometimes summoning a lightning storm to track you as you try and race back over to him. Take it slow and focus on evasion rather than trying to close the distance."
        - Following Text: "This battle may be won, but the war is far from over. Yellowbrow will freeze you in place, and use his magic seed sack to draw you into a perilous prison.
![Wukong Thunderclap 87.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ed/Wukong_Thunderclap_87.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic and intense moment from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It showcases a fiery red scene, likely during a boss battle or significant encounter. The preceding text suggests the player has depleted the enemy's health bar, prompting the enemy to vanish and summon a lightning storm, while the following text hints at the next phase of the conflict involving magical imprisonment. The image visually represents the chaotic and perilous atmosphere of this encounter.
